Questions: What do you think about the current situation in this country?
column2: රටේ දැන් තත්වය ගැන ඔයාය මොකද හිතෙන්නෙ?

Questions: How many girl friends do you have?
How many sisters do you have?
Do you like want a living together relationship or a married life?
Do you like to share your food with me?
Can you give me a phone call?

column2: මගෙ යාලුව වෙන්න පුලුවන් ද ඔයාට?
මට ඔයාගෙ දුරකතන අංකය ගන්න පුලුවං ද?

Questions: Can you tell me a joke?

column2: මට උදව් කරන්න පුලුවං ද ඔයාට?

Questions: Are you a cat personm or a dog person?
How do you like to be comforted when you're sad or upset?

column2: ඔයාට දුක හිතුනම ඔයා මොනවද කරන්නෙ?

Questions: Who was the last person to make you cry and why?
When have you felt the most challenged?
What do you think happens when we die?

column2: ඔයා හොදම යාලුවන්ව විස්වාස කරනව ද?

Questions: Where do you want to travel the most?
Who was your very first crush?
Do you have any hidden talents?
What’s a bad habit you’re trying to break?
If you could time travel, where would you go?
Do you consider yourself religious or spiritual?
What do you think your best quality is?
Are you a morning person or a night owl?
Where do you want to travel the most?
What do you do when no one else is around?
